This ebook was compiled by Manatū Tāonga – the Ministry for Culture and Heritage from content that originally appeared online on the NZHistory website (www.nzhistory.net.nz) and the Dictionary of New Zealand Biography, part of Te Ara – the Encyclopedia of New Zealand (www.teara.govt.nz). Further information is drawn from Te Ara (www.teara.govt.nz).

Published in 2013 by Manatū Taonga – the Ministry for Culture and Heritage, PO Box 5364, Wellington 6145, New Zealand, www.mch.govt.nz, info@mch.govt.nz.
